item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Zoe Trope
item.description: "sometimes every word i write is 'love' but the letters are rearranged, the sounds are different. all the words are red." -- Zoe Trope

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Zoe Trope
item.description: "I think the only necessary conclusion is that we are too beautiful, because being not beautiful at all just doesn't make sense." -- Zoe Trope

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "I myself am made entirely of flaws, stitched together with good intentions." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "My mother began to go crazy. Not in a 'Let's paint the kitchen red!' sort of way. But crazy in a 'gas oven, toothpaste sandwhich, I am God' sort of way." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Augusten Burroughs
item.description: "We were young. We were bored. And the old electroshock therapy machine was just under the stairs in a box next to the Hoover." -- Augusten Burroughs

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "Everyone looks retarded once you set your mind to it." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by David Sedaris
item.description: "If you read someone else's diary, you get what you deserve." -- David Sedaris

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I like nonsense, it wakes up the brain cells. Fantasy is a necessary ingredient in living." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Sometimes the questions are complicated and the answers are simple." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Words and pictures are yin and yang. Married, they produce a progeny more interesting than either parent." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love all, trust a few, do wrong to none." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Love looks not with the eyes, but with the mind, And therefore is winged Cupid painted blind." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "This above all: to thine own self be true, And it must follow, as the night the day, Thou canst not then be false to any man." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "You speak an infinite deal of nothing." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "It is not in the stars to hold our destiny but in ourselves." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "My tongue will tell the anger of my heart, or else my heart concealing it will break." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by William Shakespeare
Amberjade add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Lord, what fools these mortals be!" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Beware the ides of March." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "Some Cupid kills with arrows, some with traps. " -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Scott Westerfield
item.description: "The human heart is a strange vessel. Love and hatred can exist side by side." -- Scott Westerfield

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "You see, freedom has a way of destroying things." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Scott Westerfeld
item.description: "Never give us what we really want. Cut the dream into pieces and scatter them like ashes. Dole out the empty promises. Package our aspirations and sell them to us, cheaply made enough to fall apart." -- Scott Westerfeld

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "We accept the love we think we deserve." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "And in that moment, I swear we were infinite." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "It's strange because sometimes, I read a book, and I think I am the people in the book." -- Stephen Chbosky

item.title: Amberjade add a quote by Stephen Chbosky
item.description: "I would die for you. But I won't live for you." -- Stephen Chbosky
